meanings.sent1: The cat beleaps the fence effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The deer beleaps gracefully over the fallen log.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo beleaps over the puddle with a joyful bounce.
meanings.sent4: The athlete beleaps all obstacles in her path to victory.
meanings.sent5: The frog beleaps from lily pad to lily pad in the pond.

meanings.definition: To jump or leap upon suddenly or eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The dog beleaps onto the couch when it hears the doorbell.
meanings.sent2: The children beleaps with excitement when they see the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel beleaps onto the bird feeder for a surprise snack.
meanings.sent4: The cat beleaps onto the table to catch the elusive fly.
meanings.sent5: The rabbit beleaps into the garden to munch on fresh vegetables.
